titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on [4R-[3(2S*,3S*),4R*]]-3-[2-Hy-droxy-3-[(3-hydroxy-2-methyl-b enzoyl)amino]-1-oxo-4-phenylbutyl]-5,5-dimethyl-N-[(2-methyl penyl)-methyl]-4-thiazolidine-carboxamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2005, the suspension of duty on a specified chemical.
